alert.note: Alert for Florence; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 5:06PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Florence and central Williamsburg Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 505 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Santee Cooper Regional Airport, or 10 miles south of Manning, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Kingstree, Salters, Cades, Morrisville, Lane, Greeleyville, Lake City Community Hospital and Williamsburg Regional Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
